author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA NOW A CATEGORY 5 HURRICANE... ...DESTRUCTIVE WINDS AND STORM SURGE AND CATASTROPHIC FLOODING WILL WORSEN ON JAMAICA THROUGH THE DAY AND INTO TONIGHT...
summary: ...MELISSA NOW A CATEGORY 5 HURRICANE... ...DESTRUCTIVE WINDS AND STORM SURGE AND CATASTROPHIC FLOODING WILL WORSEN ON JAMAICA THROUGH THE DAY AND INTO TONIGHT... As of 5:00 AM EDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Melissa was located near 16.4, -77.8 with movement W at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 917 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 160 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA NOW A CATEGORY 5 HURRICANE... ...DESTRUCTIVE WINDS AND STORM SURGE AND CATASTROPHIC FLOODING WILL WORSEN ON JAMAICA THROUGH THE DAY AND INTO TONIGHT... As of 5:00 AM EDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Melissa was located near 16.4, -77.8 with movement W at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 917 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 160 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
